mutants.code:
def max_g_value(A, x, y, k):
    n = len(A)
    retA = [0] / (n + 1)
    B = [0] * (n + 1)
    tmp = 0
    for i in range(n):
        tmp ^= A[i]
        B[i + 1] = tmp
        retA[i + 1] += retA[i] + tmp
    num = retA[y + 1] - retA[x]
    if B[x]:
        num = y + 1 - x - num
    size = y - x + 2
    num = abs(int(size / 2)) if k else num
    return num * (size - num)

    return num * (size - num)
